```{r setup}
library(netClust)
```


### Demonstration:
Simulate binary data and learn clusters subsequently.

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Simulate binary data
ss <- c(400,500,600) # samples in each cluster
myData <- sampleData(kclust = 3, Nvars = 20, sseed = 2, samplesizes = ss)

# Network-based clustering
clusterResT <- netClust(myData, kclust = 3)
clusterRes <- netCluster(myData, kclust = 3)
clusterResTest <- netClustParallel(myData, kclust = 3)
clusterResP <- netClusterParallel(myData, kclust = 3)
```
